title: How to Change Your Display Name or Handle on X/Twitter

steps.title: Launch the X app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Launch the X app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. This looks like a white x with a black background. If you aren't already logged into your account, do so now. Use this method to change the name that appears on your profile and is bolded on your posts. If you want to change your username—which is the name after the @ symbol—skip to the next section instead.

steps.title: Tap on your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap on your profile picture. You can find this in the top-left corner of the app. The left panel will open.

steps.title: Tap Profile.
steps.content: Tap Profile . This is the first option underneath your Following and Followers count. You'll be redirected to your X profile page.

steps.title: Tap Edit profile.
steps.content: Tap Edit profile . This button can be found underneath your banner, to the right of your profile image.

steps.title: Tap the "Name" field.
steps.content: Tap the "Name" field. This is the first field.

steps.title: Enter a new name.
steps.content: Enter a new name. Erase your current name (if you have one), and then type a new one. Display names can be up to 50 characters long and include emojis or special characters.

steps.title: Tap Save.
steps.content: Tap Save . This will be in the top-right corner. Your new display name will be saved. It may take some time for it to appear on your posts.

steps.title: Launch the X app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad.
steps.content: Launch the X app on your Android, iPhone, or iPad. This looks like a white x with a black background. If you aren't already logged into your account, do so now. Use this method to change your X username (@username). This is also known as your X handle.

steps.title: Tap on your profile picture.
steps.content: Tap on your profile picture. You can find this in the top-left corner of the app. The left panel will open.

steps.title: Tap Settings and privacy.
steps.content: Tap Settings and privacy . This is towards the bottom of the left panel. A new page will open.

steps.title: Tap Your account.
steps.content: Tap Your account . You can find this at the top of the page.

steps.title: Tap Account information.
steps.content: Tap Account information . This is the first option. You may be asked to enter your login information again to verify your identity.

steps.title: Tap Username.
steps.content: Tap Username . You can find this at the top.

steps.title: Enter a new username.
steps.content: Enter a new username. Tap the field under New to enter it now. Keep in mind this must be between 4 to 15 characters and must be unique. [1] X Research source No two X users can share the same username. Usernames can only have letters, numbers, and underscores. You cannot use spaces.

steps.title: Tap Done.
steps.content: Tap Done . Your new username will be saved.

steps.title: Go to the X website on your computer.
steps.content: Go to the X website on your computer. If you aren't already logged in, enter your account information to do so now.
